job_title: Business Analyst (Pharma with ETL and EDI)
jd: From: Akash Sharma, Tekinspirations akash.s@tekinspirations.com Reply to: akash.s@tekinspirations.com Title: Business Analyst (Pharma with ETL and EDI)Location: Quincy, MA/HybridDuration: 6 Months with a possible extensionLocal Only from MA, NH or RI and must have recent client experience from these locationsIn-Person Interview2-3 days onsite every week Minimum Requirements:Broad knowledge of business and system analysis with strong experince in creating requirements and design documentsBroad technical knowledge and experience supporting a wide range of applications, data processes, and technologies (e.g. Java, .NET, Oracle, SQL Server, and SaaS Cloud).Prior experience with Jira, SQL Queries, Rational Quality Manager (RQM) and ADA compliance.Strong familiarity with NIST security standards and working with PII and PHI data.Proven understanding and knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC).5+ years of experience in business analysis and data integration.Experience managing and or working with 3rd party vendors.Experienced in epics, use cases, stories, features, and testing methodologies including functional, system, integration, performance, and UAT.Ability to develop and maintain effective relationships with management, end users, project team members, and vendors. Excellent customer service skills.Excellent oral and written communication and presentation skills.Proficient in using Microsoft Office suite, Visio, MS Project, other project management and collaboration tools. Excellent problem-solving skills.
